author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cyren And Meta Networks Enter Network Security Partnership
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Cyren Ltd:
* CYREN AND META NETWORKS ENTER STRATEGIC PARTNERSHIP FOR NEXT GENERATION NETWORK SECURITY
* CYREN LTD - CO, META NETWORKS ANNOUNCED THEIR STRATEGIC PARTNERSHIP TO DELIVER NETWORK SECURITY
* CYREN LTD - AGREEMENT WILL HAVE A POSITIVE REVENUE IMPACT ON CYREN BEGINNING THIS QUARTER Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
